summary: Results-driven Senior Technical Program Manager with 15+ years leading complex technology programs for Fortune 500 companies in financial services, insurance, and enterprise technology. Proven track record delivering large-scale cloud migrations, system integrations, and platform modernizations with cross-functional teams of 50+ engineers across global time zones. Deep expertise in Agile (Scrum, SAFe, Kanban) and Waterfall methodologies with strong technical background in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).
